CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT and CHI in room . camera shows mostly only MOT's back
MOT walks over to the boxes on the table
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI walks over to the box and sits beside it
MOT removes the cover of the box
CHI nods keeping his eyes on the book
MOT puts the pieces of the box together
CHI moves on his knees toward book
CHI turns toward MOT who is holding book
CHI pulls a blanket from the floor onto his lap then moves to sit in MOT's lap
MOT pulls CHI onto her lap
CHI looks down at the book
MOT points to picture in book
CHI leans forward and looks intently at picture
MOT points to picture in book
CHI looks at the book and shrugs his shoulders
MOT points to picture in book
MOT points to picture of rabbit
MOT points to picture in book
MOT bends her head down to CHI's head
MOT brushes CHI's hair with her hand
CHI shakes his head to indicate no
MOT points to pictures in book
MOT puts finger on picture then moves finger away
CHI shrugs his shoulders as he looks at the book
CHI pulls on a blanket on his lap
CHI looks from one page to another then points to a picture in book
MOT is pointing to pictures in book
MOT points to picture of toast in book
MOT points to picture in book
CHI nods and looks at the book
CHI gets up from MOT's lap
MOT puts book in PCI box and puts on cover of box
CHI is standing and watching MOT put away and take another PCI box
MOT gets up from floor with PCI Book box
MOT brings the box over to the floor
CHI walks over to the box
MOT removes cover of PCI box
CHI kneels down on floor to look in box
<aft> CHI picks up one of the puppets and closely examines it
CHI takes the second puppet from box and puts it on the floor
MOT picks up one of the puppets and puts it on her hand
MOT speaks in deep tone of voice to imitate Cookie Monster
MOT puts puppet in front of her face and moves its mouth
MOT moves puppet's mouth to make it look like it is chewing
MOT starts to put her other hand in second puppet
CHI moves to take second puppet
CHI puts his hand in the puppet
CHI puts puppet on his hand
MOT imitates voice of Cookie Monster
MOT moves puppet's mouth as she speaks
CHI moves puppet energetically toward MOT's puppet and then touches it
CHI grabs wildly at MOT's puppet with his
CHI holds puppet toward himself and looks at it
CHI repeatedly hits MOT's puppet with his
puppet comes off of CHI's hand
CHI takes off his puppet and removes puppet on MOT's hand
CHI puts Cookie Monster puppet on
MOt moves bird puppet's mouth as she speaks
CHI makes his puppet snap at MOT's puppet
CHI makes his puppet snap at MOT's violently
CHI puts his puppet in the box and then grabs MOT's
CHI points to another PCI box on table
MOT is out of view of camera
CHI takes the box and puts it on floor
CHI shakes cover off of the box then reaches in it
MOT kneels on floor and looks in PCI box
<$=1> CHI is pulling papers out of PCI box
CHI reaches for the crayons in the bottom of the box
CHI takes crayons out of PCI box and puts them on floor with paper
CHI starts to put the cover back on PCI box
CHI puts the cover on the box
MOT puts the paper and crayons in front of her
MOT rests her head on her hand and watches CHI
<bef> CHI turns toward MOT and papers on floor
MOT takes the crayon from CHI
CHI moves back from paper and looks down at the crayon
<aft> CHI makes noises while banging crayon
CHI bangs crayon down on paper
CHI leans over the paper watching MOT
CHI leans over the paper and watches MOT draw
CHI pulls back from the paper and looks at MOT
CHI sits up and looks at MOT
MOT imitates picking up saw from the drawing to hand it to CHI
CHI leans over paper and points to saw in picture
CHI sits back again and looks at MOT
MOT makes a back and forth movement with her hand on the paper

g.ga: make it go back and forth

u.a: MOT puts hand to saw in picture
CHI puts hand forward tentatively while still holding the crayon
CHI points to drawing and puts crayon down
CHI leans forward and points to picture
MOT imitates pushing on the paper with her hand
<4> CHI gets up on knees and drops crayon
CHI points excitedly at picture and moves MOT's hand from picture
<$=2> CHI stares down at the paper
<$=1> CHI rocks back and forth on his hands and knees
CHI gets up on his knees and looks at MOT
CHI looks at the box beside him
MOT moves a crayon closer to CHI
CHI picks up a crayon from the floor
CHI points to picture then sits back and looks at MOT
CHI sits up and looks at MOT
CHI gestures upward with his hand
<$=1> CHI gets up and moves on knees to MOT
CHI pretends he is whispering in MOT's ear
CHI lays down on floor holding crayon
CHI looks at MOT and <4-5> points to himself
CHI gets up on his knees and gestures with both hands
CHI stares blankly at the paper
CHI gets up on his knees and moves to MOT and holds her face in his hands
MOT brushes CHI's face with her hand
this is a combination of yes and no that indicates indecision
CHI turns toward PCI box and grabs it
<8-12> MOT gestures with head toward table on which PCI boxes sit
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI gets up and starts to walk to table
CHI turns around and looks at MOT
both MOT and CHI are out of sight of camera
CHI takes box cover and replaces it
CHI closes the cover on the box
CHI tries to put box on table
MOT helps put the box on table
MOT and CHI are out of sight of camera
CHI tries to carry the box but can't
MOT puts the box on the floor and sits beside CHI
CHI opens the flaps of the box
CHI tries to take Play House out of box
CHI moves to back of box
MOT pulls the house a little ways out of box
CHI tries to pull play House out but pushes it back in box instead
MOT pulls play house out of box again
MOT reaches into the house and takes a figure out
CHI's back is to the camera
CHI pushes toy car around on the floor
MOT points to another figure on floor
CHI looks at the dog figure
CHI starts to push toy car around again
CHI makes engines noises as he pushes car
CHI moves back toward Play house and looks in
CHI picks up toy car again and drives it into the garage
<$=2> CHI starts to arrange and move toys in house
there is 26 second period following this utterance while CHI plays with figures inside house and his back is to camera
while blocked from camera's view CHI continues to play with house and makes some noises
